text: Jaamat ul-Mujahideen (Assembly of Mujahideen) is a islamist militant group from Bangladesh. The group is designated a terror group by Malaysia, India, Bangladesh, the United Kingdom, and Australia. The group was founded in April 1998 by Abdur Rahman and gained attention when documents about the group was leaked in 2001. The group was designated a terrorist group by Bangladesh in February 2005 due to attacks on charities. == References == Category:Militant groups
title: Jamaat-ul-Mujahideen
